table_description: AWS Step Functions State Machine Execution

columns.name: execution_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the execution.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the execution.

columns.name: input
columns.description: The string that contains the JSON input data of the execution.

columns.name: output
columns.description: The JSON output data of the execution.

columns.name: state_machine_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the executed state machine.

columns.name: stop_date
columns.description: If the execution already ended, the date the execution stopped.

columns.name: trace_header
columns.description: The AWS X-Ray trace header that was passed to the execution.

columns.name: input_details
columns.description: Provides details about execution input or output.

columns.name: output_details
columns.description: Provides details about execution input or output.
